Instance.description: Controls the dampening applied on on modifiers

Tunable.name: BonyLimit
Tunable.description: Maximum combined amount of the modifier and the bony physique value. Default is 2.0 (both modifier and physique can be at 1.0 - undampened). Minimum is 1.0 (At a physique value of 1.0, the modifier value is forced to 0.0).

Tunable.name: FitLimit
Tunable.description: Maximum combined amount of the modifier and the fit physique value. Default is 2.0 (both modifier and physique can be at 1.0 - undampened). Minimum is 1.0 (At a physique value of 1.0, the modifier value is forced to 0.0).

Tunable.name: HeavyLimit
Tunable.description: Maximum combined amount of the modifier and the heavy physique value. Default is 2.0 (both modifier and physique can be at 1.0 - undampened). Minimum is 1.0 (At a physique value of 1.0, the modifier value is forced to 0.0).

Tunable.name: LeanLimit
Tunable.description: Maximum combined amount of the modifier and the lean physique value. Default is 2.0 (both modifier and physique can be at 1.0 - undampened). Minimum is 1.0 (At a physique value of 1.0, the modifier value is forced to 0.0).

Tunable.name: ModifierName
Tunable.description: Modifier name. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadModifier_Brows_Arched' or 'ymHeadBelly_Big'.

TunableList.name: SculptLimits
TunableList.description: List of sculpts that dampen the modifier

TunableTuple.name: SculptLimit
TunableTuple.description: Dampening amount for a single sculpt.

Tunable.name: Limit
Tunable.description: Maximum value that the modifier can have when this sculpt is present. Default is 1.0 (no dampening). Minimum is 0.0 (modifier is fully dampened with this sculpt).

Tunable.name: MinValue
Tunable.description: Minimum value that the modifier can have when this sculpt is present.

Tunable.name: SculptName
Tunable.description: Sculpt name. This must be prefixed with the name of the .sculpts.xml where this sculpt is defined. For example: 'yfHeadSculpt_Eyes_European05'.

TunableEnum.name: OccultType
TunableEnum.description: The occult type this modifier tuning is specific to.

TunableEnum.name: Species
TunableEnum.description: The species this modifier tuning is specific to.
